   Anthony Rogers
   stated on September 15, 2020 in a Facebook post:
   "Cori Bush is a career criminal and a con artist.”
   true false
     * Candidate Biography
     * Missouri
     * Anthony Rogers
   Veronica Mohesky
   By Veronica Mohesky September 29, 2020

Cori Bush’s court cases aren’t criminal despite claims by opponent

    If Your Time is short

     * Bush has had 11 court cases, but they are all civil, not criminal.
"Cori Bush is a career criminal and a con artist.

In an email and an interview with Rogers, the candidate gave a number of
   claims about why Bush is still a con artist and criminal.

Our ruling

   Rogers called Bush a "career criminal and a con artist" on Facebook, but
   there is no evidence to suggest that Bush is either.
